CustomField.description: Reference to the calculated value based on Item Type and secondary category values.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Item_Type__c,'Service'),IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Basic Inst Growth Assy'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Basic Inst New Assy'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Basic Inst New Test'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Capital Constr'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Suppl Inst Test')),'Installation',IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Basic Eng Incremental'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Basic Eng Initial'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Enhanced Srvcs'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Suppl Eng Assy'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Suppl Eng Drafting'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Suppl Eng Other')),'Engineering',IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Consultng Progrmng'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Hdwr Repair Srvces'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Installtn Labor'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'IP/Telcom Network Mgmt'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Maintnc Or Warranty'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Other Prof Services'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Prodct Doc Devlpmt'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Sftwr Development'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Sftwr Maintc-Cannd'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Sftwr Maintc-Custm'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Training'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Haul - Hoist'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c ,'Warehousing'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Proc Soft Maint-Canned'),ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c,'Proc Warranty')),'Other',IF(ISPICKVAL(CPQ_Secondary_Category__c ,'Transportation'),'Transportation','')))),'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Reference to the calculated value based on Item Type and secondary category values.
CustomField.label: Price Class
